title: Progress Over Perfection
content: Striving for perfection can lead to procrastination. It's better to make small, consistent progress than to wait for the perfect moment or the perfect plan. **Done is better than perfect.**

title: Seek to Understand
content: Before forming an opinion or offering a solution, take the time to truly understand the situation from all perspectives. This applies to product design, personal relationships, and everything in between.

title: Strong Opinions, Loosely Held
content: Have the courage to form a strong hypothesis and act on it, but also have the humility to change your mind when presented with new evidence. This is the foundation of intellectual honesty and effective learning.
